Question: Nevertheless, in his Memorabilia, Xenophon presents Glaucon as younger than this person.
Hints: Instead of rhetoric and persuasion, this person says reason and wisdom should govern.
Many papyri which contain fragments of this person's texts are among the Oxyrhynchus Papyri.
Dicaearchus went so far as to say that this person wrestled at the Isthmian games.
